message.raw:
* Fix bug: Fix problem when attaching no body to a joint. Before calling
  setRelativeValues a check is made for bodies.
* Add an epsilon to the testRotationalLimit to avoid round off error
  or numerical error when the diff is not in the same direction as the rate.
* Remove compilation warning
* Add unittest
message.html:
• Fix bug: Fix problem when attaching no body to a joint. Before calling
    setRelativeValues a check is made for bodies.
  • Add an epsilon to the testRotationalLimit to avoid round off error
    or numerical error when the diff is not in the same direction as the rate.
  • Remove compilation warning
  • Add unittest
